title: Addition to endgame stats (Shields)
body:
So, in the endgame stats we have healing done (lifesteal, regen, heals), damage done (phys, magic, true) etc.
What do you think of the addition of shielding done [and/or effective shielding (amount of shield that blocks damage)]?
It's not too meaningful but it would be a nice addition for people like me that enjoy looking at the endgame stats and it shouldn't be hard to implement.

replies.body: I feel bad for doing it again, but bump?

Please bump this if you agree with this idea so it gets seen, hopefully Riot will actually implement this.

Although really, the discuss section is really to discuss stuff, so please go ahead.
I would suggest showing amount of abusive words said per team and per individuals too!
Feel like that would be a bit hard to track :P
I actually went to write how easy it would be, but then I realised that if it was easy, Riot would have implemented it.

It's easy to implement, if you spam the * inducing words you get an auto warning on EUW. 

Pretty sure that's not the case in OCE otherwise we will have a lot of warnings loL!
Well in that case there is no excuse. We should have that same system.
As much as this would be amazing, Rito would find a way to make it bug out.
